docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: An onslaught of studies describing the extent of contamination of the nation's food supply by pesticides, animal drugs and bacteria is giving Congress political indigestion.

headline.main: CONGRESS LOOKS TO THE AMERICAN TABLE AMID QUESTIONS ON FOOD SAFETY

docs.snippet: LEAD: An onslaught of studies describing the extent of contamination of the nation's food supply by pesticides, animal drugs and bacteria is giving Congress political indigestion.

byline.original: By KEITH SCHNEIDER, Special to the New York Times
